subtitle: The scale of your empire is determined by the strength of the alliance you choose. No hidden costs. Only shared victory.

rebel.title: Rebel Pact
rebel.subtitle: For the lone warriors who stay in control.

ruler.title: Ruler's Decree
ruler.subtitle: For those who only set the vision.

blacksmith.title: Blacksmith's Forge
blacksmith.subtitle: For the masters who forge their own arsenal.
features: Create your own plan with marketplace tiers and AI tools

alliances.title: Custom Alliances
alliances.subtitle: Beyond the standard pacts, for special missions.

dynamic.title: Dynamic Alliance
dynamic.description: A flexible partnership that shares the workload and constantly adjusts the profit share. It evolves with you.

build_transfer.title: Build and Transfer Decree
build_transfer.description: We build your empire for you and hand you the keys. A one-time, powerful start.

faq.title: War Council: FAQ
faq.subtitle: What you need to know before setting your strategy.

questions.q: What exactly does "% of Profit" mean?
questions.a: Profit is the net revenue after product costs and marketplace commissions are deducted. We show every penny transparently in your finance panel. Nothing is hidden.

questions.q: Can I change or cancel my plan at any time?
questions.a: Yes. The decree is yours. There are no long-term commitments. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan for your next billing cycle at any time.

questions.q: Who owns the website and brand in the Ruler's Decree?
questions.a: You. We build and manage on your behalf, but all intellectual property rights and assets are entirely yours. We are just the loyal architects of your empire.

basic_plan.title: Basic Plan: Your AI Superpowers
basic_plan.description: Do you want to be in control but hate repetitive tasks? The Basic Plan offers everything you need to automate your business and grow.
basic_plan.feature1_text: Unlimited access to all Ekobol features.
basic_plan.feature2_text: Image generation, description writing, price optimization, and inventory automation.
basic_plan.feature3_text: Seamlessly connect Trendyol, Etsy, Amazon, and more.
basic_plan.feature4_text: Manage and analyze all your business from one place.
basic_plan.strategy_text: You set your strategy, and we'll automate the tedious tasks, giving you back your most valuable asset: time.

build_transfer_service.title: Build and Transfer Service: Your Digital Empire, Built for You.
build_transfer_service.description: Dreaming of a professional e-commerce presence fully owned by you? We build it from scratch, then hand you full control.
build_transfer_service.service1_text: Professional design and development tailored to your brand, from a basic store (starting price $8,000) to advanced features ($16,000).
build_transfer_service.service2_text: Seamless connection and initial setup for platforms like Trendyol, Etsy, Amazon, and more. Includes brand creation and configuration per channel, plus listing up to 100 products per integrated channel (price per channel quoted separately).
build_transfer_service.service3_text: Essential search engine optimization for your new digital presence.
build_transfer_service.service4_text: We will provide handover and training to ensure you are confident in managing your new digital assets.
build_transfer_service.service5_text: Upon completion, full control and ownership of all created assets (website code, marketplace accounts, content) are transferred to you.
build_transfer_service.note: This service is ideal for businesses seeking a professional digital launch without a long-term management commitment from Ekobol. Prices vary based on selected components, complexity, and number of integrations. Contact us for a detailed project proposal.

dynamic_plan.title: Dynamic Plan: Ultimate Flexibility
dynamic_plan.description: Your needs can change over time. The Dynamic Plan offers a partnership adjusted according to the workload between you and our platform.
dynamic_plan.how_it_works_text1: The Dynamic Plan is a special revenue sharing model based on the effort both parties bring to the table. Do you want to handle some marketing tasks yourself? Great, your share increases. Do you want to hand everything over to us? No problem, shares are adjusted accordingly.
dynamic_plan.how_it_works_text2: It is the ultimate flexible partnership for growing businesses. Increase or decrease your effort, your plan adapts with you.
dynamic_plan.cta_description: This plan is all about collaboration. Contact our team to discuss your unique needs and let's create a custom plan for you.

partner_plan.title: Partner Plan: We Build, You Create
partner_plan.description: Your genius lies in creating great products, not managing digital listings. Become our partner, and we'll build your digital empire for you.
partner_plan.feature1_text: Full access to all AI tools and the platform.
partner_plan.feature2_text: We create your professional brand identity and e-commerce site.
partner_plan.feature3_text: We manage SEO, advertising campaigns, and social media.
partner_plan.feature4_text: We manage listings, marketplace support, and customer service.
partner_plan.feature5_text: We work closely with you to ensure your success.
partner_plan.strategy_text: Just produce and ship your products. We'll handle everything else. A true partnership.
